account.firstTimeText: Looks like you are using the app for the very first time. Please login with your Office 365 Account to get started!

additionalOptions.syncDueDatesQuestion: Should the Jira issue due date be synced to the To Do task?
additionalOptions.preferredTaskResolveCriteriaQuestion: When the Jira issue is completed, should we check off the task in To Do?
additionalOptions.microsoftNotificationsQuestion: When a task is completed in To Do, transition the issue?

changeCriteriaMessage.reEnableSyncInfo: In order to apply new settings you need to re-enable synchronization.
changeCriteriaMessage.deleteNoLongerMatchingTasksQuestion: Do you want to delete tasks that don't match your new criteria anymore?

changeFolderMessage.newTasksMigrateInfo: New tasks will now be created in task folder that you have just selected.
changeFolderMessage.oldTasksDoNotMigrateInfo: Please keep in mind that previously created tasks will not migrate to that folder.

contentPanel.welcomeToProduct: Welcome to Microsoft To Do for Jira!
contentPanel.firstTimeUserText: Looks like you are using the app for the very first time.
contentPanel.loginWithMicrosoftInfo: Please login with your Microsoft account to get started!
contentPanel.invalidLicenseInfo: You don't have a valid license or it has expired. If you'd like to continue using our app, please get valid license!
contentPanel.createNewTaskInlineEditEditViewTooltip: To Do list for your new task

disableMicrosoftWebhooksModal.areYouSureYouWantToDisableWebhooksInfo: Are you sure you want to disable Microsoft notifications? This action will disable automatic issues resolving.

disableSyncModal.areYouSureYouWantToDeleteAlreadySyncedTa: Do you want to delete all existing tasks that have already been synced?

enableMicrosoftWebhooksModal.statusSelectInfo: Select status where you want to move issue when corresponding task gets completed in the Microsoft To Do app.

finalStep.syncReadyInfo: You are all set, you can start the sync below.

gettingStarted.flagDescription: Welcome to Microsoft To Do for Jira. Go to any issue and log in with your Office 365 account to get started!
gettingStarted.syncInfo: Besides adding To Do tasks manually, your users can also configure an automatic synchronization, based on certain criteria (e.g. issues assigned to them). For details, please refer to our documentation!
gettingStarted.invalidLicenseInfo: You don't have a valid license or it has expired. If you'd like to continue using our app, please get valid license!

issueFilters.onlyCurrentProjektInfo: Issue Criteria (only matches issues in current project)

jqlInfo.aboutToSyncNultipleInfo: You are about to sync {{issuesAmount}} issues to Microsoft To Do.
jqlInfo.aboutToSyncSingleInfo: You are about to sync 1 issue to Microsoft To Do.
jqlInfo.syncWillStayActiveInfo: Afterwards, we'll continuously sync new and updated Jira issues automatically.
jqlInfo.aboutToSyncZeroInfo: There are currently no issues matching your criteria.
jqlInfo.syncWillStayActiveAfterZeroInfo: If you start the sync, new and updated Jira issues matching your criteria will continuously be synced.

link.activateSyncStepCreateTaskTemplate: You are all set - now you can {link} from every issue.
link.activateSyncStepSyncTaskTemplate: If you want to configure a {link} for this project, continue below.

logoutModal.areYouSureYouWantToLogoutInfo: Are you sure you want to logout? This action will disable all active synchronizations among all projects.

mainPage.invalidLicenseInfo: You don't have a valid license or it has expired. If you'd like to continue using our app, please get valid license!

preferredResolveCriteria.autoResolved: Automatically complete the task for resolved or deleted issues
preferredResolveCriteria.autoNoMatch: Automatically complete the task when the issue doesn't match the above criteria anymore
preferredResolveCriteria.disabled: Do not complete To Do tasks automatically

settings.headline: Sync Settings
settings.subHeadline: The following settings allow you to configure a sync for Jira issues of the current project.

simpleConfig.headline: Simple mode it is!
simpleConfig.introTextLine1: This app allows you to add new tasks from any issue or configure an automatic sync for this project.
simpleConfig.introTextLine2: If you are not using Microsoft To Do yet, make sure to check out the app first!

spotlightWrapper.headline: Set it up
spotlightWrapper.filterDescription: Please select filters for those issues that you'd like to synchronize to your To Do list.
spotlightWrapper.selectListDescription: Select or create the To Do list where your Jira issues should appear.

step1.headline: Start with Microsoft To Do
step1.ifNewInstallAndLoginWithMicrosoftInfo: In case you are new to Microsoft To Do, please install it first and create an account (or use your existing Office 365 / Microsoft Login)

step2.headline: Login with your account
step2.toContinueLoginInfo: To continue, we need to be able to create new tasks in your list. Log in below to allow us this access.

step3.headline: Choose which Jira issues you'd like to see in which To Do list
step3.selectIssueOptionsTitle: Choose Criteria (or switch to advanced for more)
step3.selectIssueOptionMyIssues: Issues assigned to me in this project
step3.selectIssueOptionPrio: Issues with the highest priority in this project
step3.selectIssueOptionCustomDescription: Switch to advanced mode to configure
step3.splitSentenceAlwaysIgnoredIssuesPart1: Please note: In simple mode, Jira issues with the status
step3.chooseOrCreateToDoListPlaceholder: Choose or create a To Do list
step3.selectOrCreateList: Select a list or start typing to create a new one

step4.headline: When the Jira issue is done, should we complete the task in To Do?
step4.syncTaskCompletionFromIssueCompletionInf: If you select yes, resolving a Jira issue will check off the item from your To Do list.

step5.headline: When the task in To Do is completed, should we change the status of the Jira issue?
step5.syncIssueFromTaskCompletionInfo: Enable changing status of jira issues
step5.selectStatusToChangeIssueToInfo: If you select yes, you'll need to choose the status that we should transition the Jira issue to, after a task has been completed in To Do.

welcome.headline: Hi {{name}}, welcome to Microsoft To Do for Jira!
welcome.introText: This app allows you to see all your relevant Jira issues in you personal To Do app. To get started, just select an option below - you can switch any time!
welcome.simpleConfigDescription: Choose this if you are new to Microsoft To Do or just want to get started without much configuration.
welcome.advancedConfigDescription: Choose this if you already know your way around To Do and Jira very well. This let's you configure every single detail.
